alert.note: Alert for Clay; East Becker; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; South Clearwater; West Becker (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 1:11AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Clay, southwestern Hubbard, southeastern Norman, southern Mahnomen, Becker and south central Clearwater Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 110 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from North River to near Shoreham. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Detroit Lakes, Dilworth, Hawley, Glyndon, Frazee, Mahnomen and Twin Valley. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 5 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Clay; East Becker; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; South Clearwater; West Becker
